main event: A sighting of a semi-circular object that hovered overhead and moved southward silently, observed for two hours.
interesting points: The object was seen with binoculars over a duration of two hours,The object disappeared to the southeast at an elevation of about 45 degrees,The observer was initially attracted by what seemed to be an unusually bright star,The report suggests various conclusions about the sighting, including balloon and aircraft possibilities,The sighting involved multiple observations from different witnesses in the area.
witness description: observer attracted by bright star, used binoculars
